snippet: An investigation into the organization charged with caring for the Alamo found that it misused state money for its own benefit and hid the depths of the organization’s financial distress from the Texas Legislature.
abstract: Texas state attorney general's office releases report investigating Daughters of the Republic of Texas, patriotic women's group charged with caring for the Alamo; finds group misused state money for its own benefit and hid depths of organization’s financial distress from Texas Legislature.
lead_paragraph: An investigation into the organization charged with caring for the Alamo found that it misused state money for its own benefit and hid the depths of the organization’s financial distress from the Texas Legislature.

headline.seo: A Management Skirmish Brews at the Alamo
headline.main: In Texas, Another Skirmish Brews at the Alamo
headline.print_headline: In Texas, a Skirmish Brews at the Alamo, This Time Over Its Management

keywords.value: Daughters of the Republic of Texas
keywords.name: organizations
